definitions.text: the part of the leg of a human being below the ankle joint
examples: his bare feet projected from his trousers

definitions.text: a linear unit of length equal to 12 inches or a third of a yard

examples: curled up on the foot of the bed

definitions.text: the pedal extremity of vertebrates other than human beings

examples: it was built on a base of solid rock
he stood at the foot of the tower

definitions.text: any of various organs of locomotion or attachment in invertebrates
a member of a surveillance team who works on foot or rides as a passenger
an army unit consisting of soldiers who fight on foot
examples: there came ten thousand horsemen and as many fully-armed foot

definitions.text: (prosody) a group of 2 or 3 syllables forming the basic unit of poetic rhythm
a support resembling a pedal extremity
examples: one foot of the chair was on the carpet
pick up the burden of high-interest mortgages
let's hoof it to the disco
